title: What is the impact of technology on livelihood? - Quora

response.answer_text: When I developed the technology to cheaply enhance solar panels by 25%, I was flattered by its evaluation of a $Trillion until I realized that it is too dangerous to work among the farm panels when the sun shines, so we have to work at night, from dusk to dawn for our livelihood! I was raised on a dairy, milking 14 hours a day so I have an idea of what 12 hours a day means; you are going to need help and a lot of night-time supervision, but it can be done in many languages and you will miss a lot of dances.
